column4: I guess my main worry is that the two partitions - the one I want to shrink and the one I want to grow - are not next to each other. (hda10 and hda14 respectively). Is this going to matter?
- Could I shrink hda14 and then grow hda13 - then shrink hda13 and grow hda12 - and so on, until I get hda10 to grow to where I want it?
well it is a risky game to play like that whith partitions but it is up to you. it should work
